key_findings: Multiple witnesses reported hearing shots from different directions, suggesting more than one shooter.
Several testimonies describe seeing suspicious individuals in the vicinity of the assassination site.
consistent_information: Many witnesses consistently reported hearing three shots.
There is a common description of a man with a rifle in the Texas School Book Depository.
contradictions: Some witnesses claimed shots came from the grassy knoll, while others insisted they came from the Texas School Book Depository.
Discrepancies exist in the timing and sequence of the shots as reported by different witnesses.
potential_evidence: Some testimonies were allegedly altered or ignored in official reports, suggesting possible suppression of information.
missing_information: Detailed accounts of witness interviews are missing, making it difficult to verify the authenticity of some claims.
There is a lack of comprehensive cross-examination of witnesses in the available documents.
assassination_theories: Theories suggesting a second shooter are supported by witness claims of shots from the grassy knoll.
Some testimonies align with the theory of a coordinated effort involving multiple individuals.
